백준 Silver3 - 1로 만들기

by Jung Jaeeun

March 15, 2021
in Problem-solving

백준 1463번

풀이

n = int(input())
INF = int(1e9)
dp = [INF] * (n+1)
dp[1] = 0
for i in range(1, n+1):
    if i % 3 == 0 and 0 <= i // 3 <= n:
        dp[i] = min(dp[i], dp[i // 3]+1)
    if i % 2 == 0 and 0 <= i // 2 <= n:
        dp[i] = min(dp[i], dp[i // 2]+1)
    if 0 <= i-1 <= n:
        dp[i] = min(dp[i], dp[i-1]+1)

print(dp[n])
Tags: python, coding-test, programmers, boj, baekjoon
